title: Copper
desc: Copper is a platform that allows users to create and join chat rooms to communicate with others. It is a combination of Discord and Instagram with some features from other platforms included.

title: Retrievium
desc: Retrievium is a data-management and modeling platform for predictive analytics in chemical sciences - the GitHub of chemistry. It allows you to share, search, and discover research data in various fields of chemistry.

title: Baja Dash
